sentences.english: "This past year has been very hard on the family, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 過去一年對於我們而言，非常地難捱。

sentences.english: At night he would lie sleepless on his cot, suffering an almost unbearable frustration.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他躺在行軍牀上睡不着覺，灰心喪氣難熬難捱。

sentences.english: Ask your child to help you figure out how to make the self-care experience better.
sentences.chinese: 讓孩子幫你找出如何使獨自在家不那麼難捱的方法。

sentences.english: This is the most hard part.
The day of no writing is so painful.
sentences.chinese: 沒有寫作的日子很難捱。

sentences.english: "It has been a hard winter, " Grandpa said to the turtle.
sentences.chinese: “好難捱的冬天啊，”爺爺對烏龜說。

sentences.english: The toughest part was the waiting.
The lady who had been racked with pain died yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦難捱的女士於昨天去世了。

sentences.english: For years it was the bane of every British schoolchild's life.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，這一直是英國學生生涯裏難捱的時光。

sentences.english: Never give up, trying times will pass.
sentences.chinese: 永不放棄，難捱的時光總會過去的。
